metaTags.metaDescription: Join us in learning about innovations in Cloudflare during Platform Week.

relatedBlades.title: Platform Week
relatedBlades.copy: Providing the building blocks for a more programmable, portable, and powerful Internet.

features.title: Platform Week wrap-up
features.description: Recently, during Platform Week, we made a number of announcements expanding what's possible with the Developer Platform. Let's take a look at some of these and what this enables you to build.

features.title: Welcome to Platform Week
features.description: This Platform Week, we don't want to deliver on just new and shiny things (though there will be a few of those, too!). We want to deliver on principles. On letting the best solution win. On breaking developers out of lock in: whether because of code, or because of economics

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Welcome to Platform Week
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Welcome to Platform Week

features.title: Developer Speaker Series
features.description: We're excited to announce a new edition of our Developer Speaker Series for 2022. Check out the eleven expert web dev speakers, developers, and educators that we've invited to speak live on Cloudflare TV this week.

features.title: A Community Group for Web-interoperable JavaScript runtimes
features.description: Cloudflare is excited to be a part of the launch of the Web-interoperable Runtimes Community Group, a new effort that brings contributors from Cloudflare Workers, Deno, and Node.js together to collaborate on common Web platform API standards.

features.title: Open source Managed Components for Cloudflare Zaraz
features.description: Fixing third-party security issues and bloat takes collaborative work. We are open sourcing Managed Components so everyone can use fast and secure third-parties, everywhere.

features.title: Cloudflare and StackBlitz partner to deliver an instant and secure developer experience
features.description: We're excited to announce that we're partnering with StackBlitz. Together, we will bring the Wrangler experience closer to you – directly to your browser, with no dependencies required

features.title: The next chapter for Cloudflare Workers: open source
features.description: As the first announcement of Platform Week, today Cloudflare is announcing the open sourcing of the Workers runtime under the Apache v2 license!

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Open Source Workers Runtime
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Open Source Workers Runtime

features.title: 10 things I love about Wrangler v2.0
features.description: Last November, we announced the beta release of a full rewrite of Wrangler, our CLI for building Cloudflare Workers. Since then we've been working round the clock to make sure it's feature complete, bug-free, and easy to use. We are proud to announce that Wrangler goes public today for general usage, and can't wait to see what people build with it!

features.title: Announcing Workers for Platforms: making every application on the Internet more programmable
features.description: Announcing Workers for Platforms, our tool suite to help make any product programmable, and help our customers deliver value to their customers and developers instantaneously.

features.title: Introducing Direct Uploads for Cloudflare Pages
features.description: Pages now supports direct uploads to give you more power to build and iterate how you want and with the tools you want.

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Announcing Direct Uploads for Pages
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Announcing Direct Uploads for Pages

features.title: Service Bindings are Generally Available, with efficient pricing
features.description: Service bindings are an API that facilitate Worker-to-Worker communication. You can invoke other Workers directly from your code; making it possible to communicate with shared services. We'll also make it cost efficient to run multiple Workers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Service Bindings are Generally Available, with efficient pricing
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Service Bindings are Generally Available, with efficient pricing

features.title: Workers Visibility: Announcing Logpush for Worker's Trace Events
features.description: Customers are using Cloudflare Workers to create the next big thing, we're building tools to make that happen successfully. We're excited to announce Logpush for Worker's Trace Events, making it easier than ever to gain visibility into applications built on Workers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Workers Visibility: Announcing Logpush for Worker's Trace Events
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Workers Visibility: Announcing Logpush for Worker's Trace Events

features.title: A new era for Cloudflare Pages builds
features.description: Announcing several build experience improvements for Cloudflare Pages including build times, logging and configuration.

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Cloudflare Pages Build Improvement
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Cloudflare Pages Build Improvement

features.title: A New Hope for Object Storage: R2 enters open beta
features.description: R2 Object Storage is now in open beta, available for all customers to test and deploy!

features.title: Durable Objects Alarms — a wake-up call for your applications
features.description: Durable Object alarms let you call a function at a defined point in the future, unlocking deeper use-cases for Durable Objects like reliable queuing.

features.title: Introducing Cache Reserve: massively extending Cloudflare's cache
features.description: Today, I'm delighted to announce a massive extension of the benefits of caching with Cache Reserve: a new way to persistently serve all static content from Cloudflare's global cache. By using Cache Reserve, customers can see higher cache hit ratios and lower egress bills.

features.title: Logs on R2: slash your logging costs
features.description: You shouldn't have to make trade-offs between keeping logs that you need and managing tight budgets. R2's low costs makes this decision easier for our customers. We're excited to announce that you can now use Logpush to store logs on R2!

features.title: Announcing D1: our first SQL database
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce D1, Cloudflare's first SQL database, designed for Cloudflare Workers.

features.title: Introducing Pages Plugins
features.description: Introducing Pages Plugins – reusable and customizable chunks of runtime code that can be incorporated anywhere within your Pages application. Try one of the officially supported Plugins from our partners or build your own.

features.title: Announcing Pub/Sub: Programmable MQTT-based Messaging
features.description: Announcing the beta of Cloudflare Pub/Sub, our programmable, serverless message broker built on the open MQTT messaging standard.

features.title: Introducing Custom Domains for Workers
features.description: Custom Domains are now available for your Workers. Hook up a Worker to any domain you own, and Cloudflare will handle making DNS records and issuing certificates on your behalf.

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Introducing Custom Domains for Workers
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Introducing Custom Domains for Workers

features.title: How we built config staging and versioning with HTTP applications
features.description: Learn how we built config versioning and staging for L7 configuration with HTTP Applications.

features.title: Our growing Developer Platform partner ecosystem
features.description: Cloudflare's Developer Platform Ecosystem continues to expand ensuring you can integrate with the tools you use, or want to use.

features.title: Magic NAT: everywhere, unbounded, and lower cost
features.description: Network Address Translation (NAT) is one of the most common and versatile network functions, used by everything from your home router to the largest ISPs. Today, we're delighted to introduce a new approach to NAT that solves the problems of traditional hardware and virtual solutions. Magic NAT is free from capacity constraints, available everywhere through our global Anycast architecture, and operates across any network (physical or cloud).

features.title: Introducing Workers Analytics Engine
features.description: Workers Analytics Engine is a new way to get telemetry about anything using Cloudflare Workers. Workers Analytics Engine provides time series analytics built for the serverless era.

features.title: Route to Workers, automate your email processing
features.description: With Cloudflare Workers and Email Routing you now have a developer platform to implement any logic you ever wanted for programmatically handling incoming Emails. And it couldn't be easier. There are starters for the most common scenarios and a familiar coding UI built into the Email Routing experience.

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Parse Incoming Email with Workers
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Parse Incoming Email with Workers

features.title: Send email using Workers with MailChannels
features.description: MailChannels has created an email sending service specifically for Cloudflare Workers that removes all the friction associated with sending emails.

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Send Email from Workers
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Send Email from Workers

features.title: Stream with sub-second latency is like a magical HDMI cable to the cloud
features.description: Starting today, in open beta, Cloudflare Stream supports video playback with sub-second latency over SRT or RTMPS at scale.

features.title: Closed Caption support coming to Stream Live
features.description: Soon, Stream will auto-detect embedded captions and include it in the live stream delivered to your viewers.

features.title: Announcing the Cloudflare Images Sourcing Kit
features.description: Migrating millions of images into Cloudflare is now simple, fast and at the distance of a few clicks. The new Cloudflare Images Sourcing Kit allows you to define your image sources, reuse them when you need to add new images or refresh existing ones.

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week - Cloudflare Images Sourcing Kit
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week - Cloudflare Images Sourcing Kit

features.title: Cloudflare Stream simplifies creator management for creator platforms
features.description: Many Stream customers track video usage on a per-creator basis. Today, we are announcing creator management to make usage tracking much easier.

features.title: Bring your own ingest domain to Stream Live
features.description: Starting today, every Stream account can configure its own domain in the Stream dashboard.

features.title: Part 1: Rethinking Cache Purge, Fast and Scalable Global Cache Invalidation
features.description: This is Part 1 of what will be a year-long series documenting our journey to re-architect our systems to be the best, fastest, most-scalable purge in the industry.

features.title: Gaining visibility in IPFS systems
features.description: We've developed the IPFS Gateway monitor, an observability tool that runs various IPFS scenarios on a given gateway endpoint. In this post, you'll learn how we use this tool and go over discoveries we made along the way

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week - Gaining visibility in IPFS systems
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week - Gaining visibility in IPFS systems

features.title: Proof of Stake and our next experiments in web3
features.description: Cloudflare is going to participate in the research and development of the core infrastructure that helps keep Ethereum secure, fast, as well as energy efficient for everyone

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Proof of Stake and our next experiments in web3
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Proof of Stake and our next experiments in web3

features.title: Network performance update: Platform Week
features.description: In addition to sharing a general update on where our network performance stands, we're also sharing updated performance metrics on our Workers platform. We've done an extensive benchmark of Cloudflare Workers vs Fastly's Compute@Edge, and the results are in: Workers is 25% faster.

features.title: Serving Cloudflare Pages sites to the IPFS network
features.description: Today, we're announcing we're bridging the two. We will make it possible for our customers to serve their sites on the IPFS network

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Serving Cloudflare Pages sites to the IPFS network
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Serving Cloudflare Pages sites to the IPFS network

features.title: Public access for our Ethereum and IPFS gateways now available
features.description: Today we are excited to announce that our Ethereum and IPFS gateways are publicly available to all Cloudflare customers for the first time

features.title: Announcing our Spring Developer Challenge
features.description: After many announcements from Platform Week, we're thrilled to make one more: our Spring Developer Challenge!

imageAssetFile.altText: Platform Week 22 - Announcing our Spring Developer Challenge
imageAssetFile.title: Platform Week 22 - Announcing our Spring Developer Challenge

features.title: Cloudflare Teams Up With Open Source Community to Create New API Standards for the Applications of the Future
features.description: Cloudflare announced that it is collaborating with Deno and individual core contributors of the Node.js open source project, bringing together three of the largest JavaScript environments, to give developers flexibility and choice while creating the standards of the future of edge computing.

features.title: Cloudflare Just Made Every Application on the Internet More Programmable
features.description: Cloudflare announced Cloudflare for Platforms, a new suite of tools that allows organizations to transform any application into a programmable platform for developers to build on.

features.title: Cloudflare Announces D1: The First Integrated Database for the Workers Serverless Platform
features.description: Cloudflare announced Cloudflare D1, a simple and instant serverless database. Cloudflare D1 will enable developers to start building database-backed applications using Cloudflare Workers with just a few clicks.
